name: Ring'd
description:
Watch the development timelapse here:


You can download the old 30 min and 1h builds from this page. 

30 min

Okay, 35 mins ;)

  • Moving and shooting
  • Enemy spawning (sometimes spawning inside the ring, which instakills you)
  • Die if you move out of the ring
1 hour
  • Fixed the bug with enemies spawning inside the ring
  • Added UI for score, time, and time between spawns
  • Added UI for game over
  • Added movement smoothing
  • Introduced a random death bug
2 hour
  • Fixed the random death bug
  • Added camera shake
  • Added enemy "corpse" objects
  • Added particle effects
